Entries.Resort_Towel_3: This swimsuit was a gift from a friend of Emily's... she shipped it to me from all the way out from Zuzu City.#$e#I'll be sure to cherish it.$h
Entries.summer_Sun: I miss when Emily would cook dinner... even though she'd always cook weird stuff.$s
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#Me and my sister would talk a lot... now it's just quiet.$s#$e#As much as I used to think so, Emily wasn't that weird. We had a lot more in common than I'd ever had admitted.$s#$e#I guess I should've told her that before...$s

Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like Alex. Too late for that, now...$s
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder how Alex is doing... wherever he is...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.winter_Sun: ...I think I'll go visit Alex's grave today.$s
Entries.winter_Sun6: ...I think I'll go visit Alex's grave today. Don't worry, it's just... he's an old friend.$s

Entries.winter_9.001: Well... my nose has been a little runny, but otherwise I'm doing fine!

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hi, honey! I'm mostly just here to reminisce.

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I hope Emily is doing okay in... whatever mystical voodoo afterlife she's in right now.$s#$b#I should pay my respects to her again soon.$7
